question: When you have too little water in your body, your kidneys excrete antidiuretic hormone (ADH). What happens in response to ADH?
candidate_answers: (A) You get thirsty and urinate more. (B) You get thirsty and urinate less. (C) You get hungry and sweat more. (D) You get hungry and sweat less.
answer: You get thirsty and urinate more.
label: A
